member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration
member.summary: BotConfiguration represents configuration information for a bot.
member.remarks: It is typically loaded from a .bot file on disk. This class implements methods for encrypting and manipulating the in memory representation of the configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets name of the bot.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets description of the bot.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Padlock
member.summary: Gets or sets padlock - Used to validate that the secret is consistent for all encrypted fields.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Services
member.summary: Gets or sets connected services.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets properties that are not otherwise defined.
member.value: The extended properties for the object.
member.remarks: With this, properties not represented in the defined type are not dropped when the JSON object is deserialized, but are instead stored in this property. Such properties will be written to a JSON object when the instance is serialized.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Configuration.BotConfiguration.LoadFromFolderAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Load the bot configuration by looking in a folder and loading the first .bot file in the folder.
member.param: Folder to look for bot files.
Secret to use to encrypt keys.

member.summary: Load the bot configuration by looking in a folder and loading the first .bot file in the folder.

member.summary: Load the configuration from a .bot file.
member.param: Secret to use to decrypt the file on disk.

member.summary: Save the file with secret.

member.returns: Boolean that indicates if a Project's Name is spaceless.

member.returns: Boolean that indicates if a bot configuration file's QnAMaker keys are present.
